example.subtitle: A blacklight classic that still hits
example.content: A transcendent masterpiece that redefined the possibilities of rock music. The album's seamless flow and conceptual depth create an immersive listening experience.

example.headline: Arctic Monkeys Announce Surprise Album
example.subtitle: Sheffield band drops new record with zero promotion
example.content: In an unprecedented move, Arctic Monkeys have released a surprise album with no prior announcement. The 12-track LP showcases the band's evolution while maintaining their signature sound.
example.pullQuote: We wanted to let the music speak for itself
example.author: Brittany Spanos

notes: Image data is optional but recommended
Chart entries are limited to 15 items (The Hot 15)
All text fields should be trimmed
Interview content supports narrative paragraphs and optional Q&A blocks using lines starting with Q: / A:
Empty or missing required fields will fail validation
